attributes.action: British Government to summon Israeli Ambassador and the deport Shai Masot.
attributes.background:
There is clear evidence to suggest that an Israeli diplomat has been involved in trying to "take down MPs" and also use money to influence British MPs with regards to their action on Israel
As a sovereign nation, we can not accept that any diplomat behave in such an aggressive way.

rejection.details: It has been reported that Shai Masot has resigned from his role at the Embassy and has returned to Israel. It is therefore not clear what action the UK Government could take.
